text: The Comunn Oiseanach Oilthigh Ghlaschu ("University of Glasgow Ossian Society") was established in 1831 and is the second-oldest organization on campus. Originally a discussion group in Scottish Gaelic, it has broadened its focus to raising awareness about the Gaelic language and culture especially among students of the University of Glasgow. == Aims == * To revive the Gaelic language on and off campus. * For the discussion of interesting matters among members of the society. * To put on social events for members. * To encourage the study of Scottish Gaelic. == References and external links == * An Comunn Oiseanach on Facebook * Sgeul na Gàidhlig aig Oilthigh Ghlaschu: 19mh & 20mh linn: An Comunn Oiseanach * Sgeul na Gàidhlig aig Oilthigh Ghlaschu: Sreath- dheilbh: Oiseanaich Category:University of Glasgow
title: Comunn Oiseanach Oilthigh Ghlaschu
